data.title: Architecture Image Archive & Collection
data.meta_description: The SAH Architecture Resources Archive is a digital collection of architecture images developed by the Society of Architectural Historians and Artstor.
data.text:
A Digital Archive of Architecture Images

SAHARA is a digital image archive developed by the Society of Architectural Historians in collaboration with JSTOR/ITHAKA (formerly Artstor), with funding from the Mellon Foundation. SAHARA contains nearly 200,000 images of the built environment, all contributed by SAH members. SAHARA access is one of the many benefits of SAH membership.

Visit the SAHARA collection at its new home on JSTOR where as an SAH member you can:

search for images, along with JStorâ€™s print materials and open access image collections

organize images into groups with Workspace

download individual images; download groups in Zip file or directly to PowerPoint

share images and image groups with colleagues and students (coming soon!)
